desc: The Forbidden City is a palace complex in Dongcheng District, Beijing, China. It houses the Palace Museum, and was the former Chinese imperial palace from the Ming dynasty to the end of the Qing dynasty.
Yuanming Yuan, was a complex of palaces and gardens in present-day Haidian District, Beijing, China.
The Palace Museum is a national museum housed in the Forbidden City at the core of Beijing, China.
The 798 Art District, also known as Dashanzi, is a cluster of former military factories now housing hip creative spaces in the Chaoyang District, Beijing, China
National Stadium, also known as Bird's Nest, is a stadium in Beijing in the Chaoyang District, Beijing, China
Xiangshan Park is a public park and former imperial garden at the foot of the Western Hills in the Haidian District, Beijing, China
Beijing Capital International Airport is the main international airport serving Beijing in the Shunyi District, Beijing, China
